name: 羅安恆
objective:
本課程著重於日常生活西班牙語，能使用西班牙語表達日常生活各式情境：買東西、問時間、說到個人的喜歡和休閒活動，主要為會話。

本課程專為具備西語基礎能力人士設計。

This course completes and builds upon Español Bsico-1 materials. We will cover the basic topics and grammar points for a official level of DELE A1 exam.  Upon completion of this course, the student will have the basic knowledge to hold a basic conversation about the topics covered, talk about his daily routine and describe activities that happened in the past.  A prior knowledge equal or higher to Español Bsico-1 is required to join this course (+30 hours).
